snippet.title: MMM: Murder Most Misfortunate Trailer
snippet.description:
MMM (previously known as Triple M) is a visual novel murder mystery. The story takes place at a secluded mansion estate, where a gruesome murder unfolds and everyone is a suspect. It's up to you to unmask the true killer. Interrogate the other characters, investigate the environment for clues, and form your own conclusions about the evening's mysterious events.

Your fate rests upon your deductive skills. You can accuse anyone. You might send a killer to justice. You might condemn an innocent person. Or you just might take the blame yourself.

Made by the Foolish Mortals
Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/525690/
Website: http://www.foolish-mortals.net/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/FoolishMortalsGames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/Foolish_M_Games
